title: Web Framework Overview
description: A brief overview of the basic concepts of the Web Framework with links to more docs

title: Search managers
description: Search managers handle getting data from Splunk and making it available to Web Framework components

title: Charts
description: Various chart types to be used to plot Splunk data

title: Tables
description: Table views for Splunk data

title: Form Controls
description: Splunk Web Framework form controls

title: Search manager controls
description: Views that can be used to interact with and control search managers

title: Map
description: A map controls for displaying geographic Splunk data

title: Data template
description: A client-side component for templated rendering of Splunk data

title: Using Toolkit Visualizations
description: Learn how to include visualizations from this toolkit in your app

title: Sankey Chart
description: The Sankey chart visualizes data flow between nodes

title: Bubble Chart
description: The Bubble Chart visualizes the magnitude of data values as circular areas

title: Force-directed Graph
description: The Force-Directed Graph displays information about connectivity and clustering between nodes in a network

title: Calendar Heatmap
description: The Calendar Heatmap displays time-series data on a timeline as a heatmap

title: Parallel Sets
description: The Parallel Sets graph is good for displaying multidimensional categorical data

title: Parallel Coordinates
description: The Parallel Coordinates graph is good for visualizing multidimensional data dynamically

title: Punchcard
description: Punchcard shows a count relationship between two data dimensions

title: Sunburst
description: The Sunburst shows hierarchically grouped data. This view is similar to a tree except that it uses a radial layout with the root at the center and the leaf nodes around the edges.

title: Dashboard in Django
description: This example shows how to create a simple dashboard using Django template tags for creating views and managers

title: Dashboard in JavaScript
description: This example shows how to create a simple dashboard using JavaScript to create and connect the views and managers

title: Saved reports
description: This example shows how to use a SavedSearchManager to power multiple views

title: Post-process searches
description: This example shows how to use post-process searches

title: Search properties
description: An example of programatically setting search properties

title: Cached searches
description: An example of using pre-existing jobs to power searches

title: Data binding with tokens
description: This example demonstrates how to set up data binding using tokens
